Description:

Mechanical Package Review
Cause & Effect Diagram
Alarm & Trip Schedule
Knowledge on DCS, PLC and F&G Systems (Preferred)B.E. / B.Tech (Electronics & Instrumentation / Telecommunication)
Minimum 3+ years of relevant experience
Hands-on experience in SPI / AVEVA
Handling of SPR /  Navisworks (Preferred) Wood is a global leader in consulting and engineering, helping to unlock solutions to critical challenges in energy and materials markets.
